source_objects.description: Learn the best kept secrets in pet care and pet training: dogs, cats, rabbits, horses, fish and many more.
source_objects.title: Pet Care & Training

items.title: Dog CPR, First Aid + Safety for pet pros + dedicated owners

visible_instructors.name: Melanie
visible_instructors.title: Melanie Monteiro
visible_instructors.job_title: Dog safety expert, author and pet first aid instructor

items.headline: Essential training to keep your dogs safe, attract clients & gain skills & confidence to take action in an emergency.
objectives_summary: Detailed video demonstrations for new guidelines in pet CPR, Canine Heimlich, how to read vital signs and more, using real (adorable!) dogs + training manikins
Bonus dog & puppy proofing e-book, toxic plants, foods + first aid kit handouts, links for top dog safety apps & products
Special tips for dog sitters, walkers and other pet care providers

items.title: Simple Solutions for Common Dog Behavior & Training Problems

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist

items.headline: Learn to address house soiling, chewing, barking, digging, separation anxiety, jumping up, pulling on leash and more
objectives_summary: Resolve common dog training and behavior problems, including: housesoiling, destructive chewing, excessive barking, digging, home-alone problems (and separation anxiety), leash reactivity to other dogs, hyperactivity, jumping-up, not coming when called, pulling on leash, plus lack of attention and compliance.
Prevent and resolve the problems that are likely to arrive as puppies grow into adolescent and adult dogs.
Rehabilitate adult dogs with temperament problems, including: fearfulness, fighting and biting.

items.title: Growl Class - A Workshop Demo for Reactive Dogs

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist

items.headline: Dr. Ian Dunbar demonstrates how to use a group class setting to deal with dogs that are aggressive towards other dogs
objectives_summary: Objectively assess the severity of a dog’s fighting based on a Fight:Bite ratio that examines actual damage done
Provide prognoses and accurate estimates of the time required to rehabilitate anti-social dogs
Administer a stress test to determine a dog’s level of anxiety and the source of that anxiety

items.title: Inside Your Dog's Mind with Victoria Stilwell
items.headline: Understanding canine behavior and how dogs think, feel and learn to make dog training easier & more effective.
objectives_summary: Gain a thorough understanding of the canine mind and develop tailor-made training plans and communication techniques to enrich the relationship with your dog.

Explore the different ways dogs learn (including associative and operant learning), find out how good of an imitator your dog is, and determine whether your dogs are dependent or independent learners.
Utilize custom-built cognition games and exercises to more effectively teach and communicate your dogs.

items.title: Dr. Ian Dunbar's SIRIUS® Dog Trainer Academy - All 4 Days

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist

items.headline: Learn how to train dogs the SIRIUS® way!  Learn how to run and promote your own dog-friendly dog training business.
objectives_summary: You will learn to manage and promote a dog training business.
You will learn to use games and quantification to train and motivate people to train their dogs.
You will learn to solve a wide variety of dog behavior problems, using the Behavior Problem Solving Matrix

items.title: Science-Based Dog Training (with Feeling) - All 3 Days

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist

items.headline: Learn effective and enjoyable dog training methods that are science-based and ready for real-world dog training.
objectives_summary: Learn how to raise the perfect puppy
Learn how to socialize and housetrain a new puppy
Gain a fundamental understanding of the field of Learning Theory

items.title: Crucial Concepts in Dog Behavior & Training

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist

items.headline: Learn cutting edge and common sense concepts that make dog training incredibly easy and effective
objectives_summary: Train a dog to motivated and reliable when off-leash, distracted, and/or at a distance, all without the continued need for any training aid.
Understand the five reward-based training techniques.
Reduce and eventually eliminate reliance upon training tools like leashes, collars, halters, harnesses and especially food as a lure and reward.

items.title: Treatment & Prevention of Dog Aggression: Biting & Fighting

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist

items.headline: Learn new concepts that can significantly accelerate the training of dogs with aggression and reactivity issues.
objectives_summary: Prevent dog aggression in the first place with early puppyhood socialization and handling.
Recognize early warning signs and address aggression problems before they become serious.
Teach a dog to develop bite inhibition.

items.title: Reliability and Games 2-Day Dog Training Workshop

visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist
visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar

items.headline: Training games are great for motivating owners and dogs alike. Learn to harness games to achieve rock-solid reliability
objectives_summary: Approved for 12 Continued Education Units from the CCPDT, IAABC & NADOI
Receive a Certificate of Completion (Optional - available upon request)
Train their dogs to respond reliably, even when off leash, distracted and at a distance

items.title: Punishment-Free Dog Training: 30 Day Perfect Dog Blueprint
items.headline: Create a Calm and Confident Dog in 30 Days Using These Proprietary DOG TRAINING GAMES
objectives_summary: Learn how to get rid of MASSIVE amounts of anxiety in your dog with 3 simple daily tweaks
Learn to train your dog humanely with SIMPLE step by step games that you can play in 5 minutes or less
Learn how to create a dog that you can trust around ANYTHING in your house - even the chicken on the counter

items.title: DOG BEHAVIOR & DOG TRAINING: Fix Problems & Animal Behavior

visible_instructors.job_title: Published Author, Course Creator. 35,000+ Unique Students
visible_instructors.name: Manos
visible_instructors.title: Manos Filippou

items.headline: BAD DOG BEHAVIOR? ENROLL NOW! Dog Training, Animal Behavior, Puppy Training, Canine Behavior, Dogs, Puppies/Animals/Pets
objectives_summary: From BRAIN SURGERY to DOG TRAINING. Find out what inspired this course. Also find out why managing or not your dog's bad behavior, may be a matter of LIFE or DEATH.
Over 4.5 hours of video analyzing the most common dog behavioral problems including aggression, whining, begging for food, stealing, etc., their causes and how to fix them.

DISCLAIMER 1: The course is heavily focused on THEORY and teaches you how to deal with the most common dog behavioral problems. Since our own dogs are well behaved there is NO VISUAL DEMONSTRATION. Please review curriculum before you buy.

items.title: Dog Training - Become A Dog Trainer - Dog Training Career

visible_instructors.name: Sharon
visible_instructors.title: Sharon Bolt
visible_instructors.job_title: Dog and Puppy Expert, Specialist in NLP & Law of Attraction

items.headline: Turn dog training into an ideal career & become a professional dog trainer. Get the lifestyle you want & work with dogs
objectives_summary: How to stop a dog from jumping up.
How to communicate you're in charge during feeding time.
How to stop food aggression and stealing food.

items.title: Animal Psychology/ Pets Behaviour - ACCREDITED CERTIFICATE
items.headline: Learn about behaviour in dogs, dealing with cats, rabbit behaviour, cats and dogs psychology, aggression in dogs, pet
objectives_summary: Understand psychology of dog, cat, and rabbit's behaviours
How to understand a young puppy's behaviour
Learn about formation of kitten's behaviour

items.title: Dog Training - How to Work With Aggressive Dogs.

visible_instructors.title: Ted Efthymiadis
visible_instructors.job_title: Dog trainer, author, entrepreneur, content creator.

items.headline: A start to finish view into the rehabilitation of four aggressive dogs.
objectives_summary: Work with aggressive dogs
Rehabilitate aggressive dogs
Learn to read dog body language

items.title: Natural Dog Nutrition & Wellbeing - Nature Knows Best!

visible_instructors.name: Daniel
visible_instructors.title: Daniel Coutts
visible_instructors.job_title: Natural Dog Nutrition Advocate & Passionate Pet Owner

items.headline: Discover how to boost your dog's health, extend its life, prevent disease and keep its tail wagging for longer...
objectives_summary: Understand the principles of natural feeding for dogs and how to apply it to your pet.
Identify common offending ingredients in commercial dog food linked to the most common canine diseases.
What vitality boosting canine superfoods to include in your dog's daily diet.

items.title: How to Train a Puppy

visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.title: Ian Dunbar
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert dog trainer, veterinarian and animal behaviorist

items.headline: Train your puppy the right way with Dr. Ian Dunbar. Includes 13 videos, 4 books, and 16 behavior blueprints.
objectives_summary: Train a new dog old tricks
Understand the basics of what to do before and after you get your puppy
Apply the SIRIUS method of puppy training
